TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_satudawa, title = satudawa, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/satudawa} }

S.FORM: Satudawa nu Sakizaya nayay ku mikikakaay tu nu wacu a masikaz tu pahabayay. nayay ku lecuhan henay sa matineng tuway tu nu tademawan. nicakayan mapuhed, makalamitay mala budawan ku ngangan. halipaaninay u mamacakat ku nikauzip, niaaman ku sakauzip u pulihic. mamataay a tatama tu tatayna, makilim ku mamucelay a tatayna. matinengay tu likec hakay caay kadamsay atu maliyuh paayaw. , sitanengay a tademaw, u sitangahay a kakelidan. misawacuay tu tademaw, kabidangan nu tademademaw. kau tingalaway a balucu' ku sapisuayaw tu tademaw. i baaten ku piazih sa, icelang ku balucu'. i baaten ku piazih sa, icelang ku balucu'. azaaway a limecedan. i zazan nu kabelecan nayay ku micidekay. lihalay ku eneng nu pakuyuc, pasakucukucung ku balucu' nu kakitaan.
